# File test/file_column_test.rb, line 364
  def test_empty_tmp_with_image
    e = Entry.new
    e.image_temp = ""
    e.image = uploaded_file(file_path("kerb.jpg"), "image/jpeg", 'c:\images\kerb.jpg')
    local_path = e.image
    assert File.exists?(local_path)
    e.image_temp = ""
    assert local_path, e.image
  end
